an4.116:4.1: “Mendicants, you should be diligent in four situations.
an4.116:4.3: Give up bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind; and develop good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
an4.116:4.9: Give up wrong view; and develop right view.
an4.116:5.1: A mendicant who has done these things does not fear death in lives to come.”
